zekr-update.info: A new version of Zekr is available! in this version, you can find a number of new features including: 1. Automatical and manual checking for update. 2. Revelation pack support (revelation order of suras or ayas) 3. Full screen support. 4. More advanced basic search. 5. More options for sorting search results. 6. Display sura names in a tree. 7. Enhanced Sky theme. 8. Translated or transliterated sura names/ 9. Verifying if a resource (translation or revelation pack) is authentic.
